Texts.Eng: A ^orange;sprouting table^reset; or a ^orange;Xeno Lab^reset; are useful devices that extract raw genes from plant seeds of any sort. You will most certainly require one, so ^orange;go ahead and make one now^reset;.
Try tossing some seeds in there, and wait a bit. You'll soon get some genes that you can stockpile to create ^orange;new types of plants^reset; in the Greenhouse.
